description: Main React component for the Todo application managing state, UI rendering, and API interactions.

methods.name: loadTodos
methods.description: Fetches all todos from the backend API and updates state.

methods.name: handleAddTodo
methods.description: Adds a new todo item via API and updates the local state.

methods.name: handleUpdateTodo
methods.description: Updates an existing todo through API and updates state.

methods.name: handleDeleteTodo
methods.description: Deletes a todo via API and updates state.

methods.name: handleToggleComplete
methods.description: Toggles the completion status of a todo via API and updates state.
